meanings.sent1: The book had an informational section at the end.
meanings.sent2: The website is full of informational articles.
meanings.sent3: The informational signs in the zoo made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like two informational beacons in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's voice was an informational melody in the classroom.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the communication of knowledge or data.
meanings.sent1: The seminar was very informational and helpful.
meanings.sent2: The brochure provided a lot of informational content.
meanings.sent3: The informational presentation was both informative and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His gestures were like an informational dance on stage.
meanings.sent5: The infographic was an informational masterpiece of design.
